channel.title: Clan Chat words in cap
channel.description:
Hello, quick question. On my server the first letter of each word, when talking in the clan chat is a capital. Is there anyway to make it so that the first letter of your entire message will be the only capital?
Here is an example of what i mean
[img]http://i.imgur.com/a0Qirqb.png[/img]
~Thanks

item.title: Clan Chat words in cap
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is in the client…
Search for:
capitalize(chatMessages[k])

Remove the capitalize part so it’s just:
chatMessages[k]

(Some clients have multiple instances of it, so you may have to do it twice or more)

Read full topic
